description.value: When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Hand], you can modify its target to be a set of thieves' tools. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell]{Cast the Spell} in this way, the tools move up to 20 feet towards a device or lock. After you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sustain] the spell on future turns, you can use the tools to attempt @Check[type:thievery] checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disable a Device] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pick a Lock] within the spell's range, but you take a -2 penalty to your Thievery check. If you critically fail, the spell ends and you can't use this modification again for 24 hours.
